creator: gilbert.buchner@uniqa.at
text:
In my example a hole text block ("DDDD...") is missing on the lastpage of the
generated pdf. I think it's a problem of a two-column-text that flows over 2
pages nd the second page ist the last page . If I add more blocks, with
span="all" at the end, so that a new (third) page will be generated, the
generated pdf is correct.

Created attachment 21366
example, with the missing block on the last page
creator: gilbert.buchner@uniqa.at
gadams@apache.org
text: unable to determine problem without output PDF showing reported problem
batch transition resolved+wontfix to closed+wontfix; if you believe this remains a bug and can demonstrate it with appropriate input FO file and output PDF file (as applicable), then you may reopen
creator: gadams@apache.org
